trans-unit.source: Specifies a property of the associated class that provides the implicit key value.
Implicit keys are used for keys rather than explicit `x:Key` attributes defined in XAML for an item in <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> collections.

Items in an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> dictionary (such as the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>) require a key.
In XAML, the key is typically specified by `x:Key` attribute in the XAML markup for each item in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute> is applied to classes that work with an implicit key, where the key to use for <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> inclusion comes from a different property value in the class.

Instances of the class applying the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute> can be included in an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> without an explicit key so long as the property referenced by <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> has a value that is valid as a key in that dictionary implementation.
In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
The following list references examples of WPF APIs where this attribute is applied:

For more information about the WPF resource dictionary implications of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute>, see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute"></xref> class.
The name of the property that provides the implicit key value.
Gets the name of the property that provides the implicit key value.
The name of the property that provides the implicit key value.
